items.sentence: If you do that again, Tom will be very angry.
I've told you a zillion times not to do that.
Tom couldn't have done that without our help.
I don't think I can stop Tom from doing that.
I don't think I can find the time to do that.
How could anyone in their right mind do that?
How could anyone be stupid enough to do that?
I think I'm the one who should be doing that.
Tom might not have been the one who did that.
I won't be able to do that without your help.
